title: More than 25 interpretations of seeing torn clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing torn clothes in a dream: We are often upset by the tearing of one of our favorite clothes and upset by losing it, but in modern times the name of torn clothes has changed to form a fashion, so the interpretation of torn clothes in a dream can have a bad connotation such as h. Losing a loved one, or it may be good news or a benign character trait. Torn clothes in a dream. According to many interpreters, this vision indicates bad omens or problems in the future. Torn clothes in a dream often indicate fear and anxiety in the soul, as the soul at that time is full of problems and quarrels. Commentators say that torn clothes in The dream indicates that there is evil surrounding the dreamer, as if someone is chasing him and wants to harm him, or that there is a lot of envy around him. The interpretation of a dream about a torn dress also indicates problems faced by people close to family members, especially children or first-degree relatives. The interpretation of a dream about a torn dress indicates Torn sometimes refers to the religious aspect of a person’s life, and the religious fate depends on the extent to which the garment is torn. Torn clothes in a dream show the psychological state in which the dreamer lives. Seeing a specific person tearing the dreamer’s clothes indicates that he will face problems because of the person himself and will cause him many sorrows. Seeing clothes of cheerful colors, but largely torn, indicates the presence of a deceitful person in the dreamer’s life, someone who shows the opposite of what is inside him in order to deceive him, and it should be so. Be careful of those around him. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted this vision as defects in the dreamer’s personality, such as a love of harming others or arrogance based on a weak character that lacks courage and bravery. As for the vision of taking torn clothes from a person, this indicates a serious disturbance in the financial situation that could lead to a loss. Great finances or poverty, God forbid. Also, to see clothes torn from the waist into two equal halves, this indicates the death of a loved one, perhaps a parent, or it may indicate the dreamer’s fatal illness. If a person finds that he is standing in the middle of a lot of torn clothes, then this It means that problems surround him from many sides, or it may indicate that he is immersed in problems and is unable to solve them. Seeing clothes torn along the length indicates that the children are exposed to problems in their lives or that there is a certain danger approaching one of the children, especially men. Seeing in a dream that he is being replaced Torn clothes in beautiful, new and clean clothes, this indicates that he will be able to solve his problems himself without resorting to a stranger. Torn clothes in a dream for a single woman. Torn clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman indicate that she will face many problems in the coming period, in the field of work or study. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing very torn clothes, but there is someone in front of her who gives her a new dress, and she is immersed in many problems, but there is someone who can get her out and help her. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is mending her torn clothes, this indicates her ability to solve

But if an unmarried woman sees that she is mending her torn clothes, this indicates her ability to solve

title: Interpretation of a dream about injustice in a dream for a single married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about injustice in a dream: Many physiological changes control the nature of sleep dreams. When a person sleeps hungry, he dreams of eating, and the same applies when he sleeps unfairly, he has dreams of feeling unfair, oppressed, crying, and other negative feelings, and dreams may be the result of painful memories in our memory that the mind It is emptied from time to time to get rid of the oppressive situation and psychological pressure that a person is exposed to in his real life. In this article we present the interpretation of a dream about injustice in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I am wronged and I cry. Psychologists see dreams as stories that are randomly generated due to random motives, but another group believed that the interpretation Dreams are related to memory, the idea that our brain stores memories regardless of whether we are awake or asleep, so dreams can be considered as a kind of temporary storage of consciousness. At these points, we explain the interpretation of a dream about injustice in a dream: The crying of an oppressed person in a dream indicates the death of distress and worry as well as relief. The dreamer. The dreamer’s cry with a feeling of extreme injustice could be a sign of rain. Crying without screaming and crying indicates the longevity of the dreamer. However, if the dreamer cries with tears, this means regret for committing the disobedience and sins. He must hasten to repent and seek forgiveness with sincere intention for the sake of God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing vegetables in a dream for unmarried women and what does it indicate? Interpretation of the dream of feeling persecuted in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dreams are important to get rid of unwanted associations and thoughts that accumulate in our minds and memories for a long time. Therefore, dreams are the process of cleaning our minds of all useless thoughts and paving the way for building a better and healthier human being. In these points, we explain the dream interpretation of feeling oppressed in a dream: Seeing a dream of oppression and crying in a dream is evidence of getting rid of the state of sadness and anxiety that prevailed in the dreamer’s life. Also, the dream Seeing injustice and crying in a dream indicates a high position and status enjoyed by the dreamer. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dream of injustice and crying in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s victory over those who caused him harm and damage. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity and that God God Almighty will bless him with a lot of money. If the wife feels oppressed and crying, this is evidence of the end of the problems and crises that occurred between her and her husband. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing pigs in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the oppressed defending the person. One of the most important concepts surrounding dreams is that many Among dreams are called visions, as in Islamic law, and these visions are characterized by predicting things that will happen in the future and the coming days, and revealing things unknown to man, and these visions are visions that man remembers well, free of any ambiguity and linked to his events. In these points we clarify the interpretation of defending the oppressed person: Seeing the dreamer defending someone from an oppressed person indicates that the dreamer has good qualities, a good heart, and carries a love of kindness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a message from the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a message from the dead: A person can be exposed to many situations and crises in his life, as they are like messages from which he must draw a lesson and a sermon, to avoid them in future situations, and the truth of the people around him can be revealed to him, if they offer him goodness and love in Their hearts and wanted to save him from distress, they feed him evil and do not want to remove him from his rule, but what? Interpretation of the dream of seeing a message from the dead in a dream, we will refer to that in the following lines. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a message from the dead Longing for the dead may be a reason for seeing them in a dream many times But this vision can have connotations, depending on the condition of the deceased and the state of the fortuneteller, and in this context we mention the most important indicators. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a message from the dead according to the most famous interpreters: Ibn Sirin narrated that the interpretation of seeing a dead person near the dreamer indicates the dreamer’s love for him and his longing for him. And his intense desire to see him. And when a person sees that he is receiving a message from a dead person in a dream. This indicates that the fortuneteller must leave something related to his life. If a person sees himself dying in a dream, the vision indicates that he will travel somewhere. And if he sees If a dead person gives him something in a dream, this indicates that there is an inheritance from the dead that will appear soon. But seeing a dead person in a dream full of sadness and anger means that he is angry with his actions and deeds in reality. If one sees himself dead in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s long life. As for If the deceased receives good from the fortuneteller, this is a sign of his loss. However, if the deceased visits a person in a dream and takes something bad from him, this indicates that in reality he was thrown to the ground. See also: Interpretation of a dream about crossing a busy road and its consequences. Interpretation of a dream about a paper letter. Paper letters are on their way to disappearing. And disappearing now, in light of the technological revolution and the increasing reliance on correspondence electronically through emails and other various social media that have made it possible to communicate and communicate at any time and at any time. At the same time with any person and in any place there was one, but what is the interpretation of a dream about a paper letter, we will deal with it in the following lines: Seeing receiving letters in a dream means kindness, blessing and happiness that the dreamer will have according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. But receiving a letter from someone Anonymous in a dream indicates bad and major damage to a pioneer, whether male or female. While love letters or emotional messages in a dream show the stability and happiness that the dreamer enjoys. They can herald good news, such as obtaining a job and perhaps traveling to a far away place. While letters Torn in a dream, it indicates severe distress, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. It also indicates the fortuneteller’s bad reputation among the people. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the sound of a flute or a flute in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about sending a message to the dead. Imam Nabulsi mentioned many interpretations and connotations regarding the interpretation of a dream about sending a message to the dead in a dream. Among them are the following: If one sees F

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bag in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: The bag in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin. We present to you on the Moments website what is new and distinctive in this article on our website: Interpretation of the dream: The bag in the dream. Interpretation of dreams, interpretation of dreams about a bag, dreaming of a bag in a dream, a bag in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about a bag according to Ibn Sirin, interpretation A dream about a bag in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a bag by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a bag by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or carrying a bag in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What was said in the interpretation of a bag in a dream or a dream. Learn more on the Moments website. Interpretation of the meaning of a bag in a dream in this paragraph. We talk about the interpretation of the meaning of a bag in a dream, a travel bag in a single woman’s dream. A travel bag in a pregnant woman’s dream. A travel bag in a married woman’s dream. A travel bag in a man’s dream. The theft of a travel bag or hand in a dream. A school bag or wallet in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a travel bag. In a single woman’s dream, among the signs in the dream is that the girl is getting married. The travel bag and its new vision are good news for every girl waiting for marriage to meet her life partner, if she finds the travel bag in a dream. The red color indicates marriage, white is a sign of engagement, blue is just acquaintance, and pink It is love and passion, and black indicates the failure of a marriage accompanied by divorce. Interpretation of a dream about a suitcase in a pregnant woman’s dream. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is opening a suitcase. If she finds clean clothes or clothing in it, this indicates the health of the fetus. If the opposite is true, it may be The fetus is in poor health. A blue bag indicates difficulty in giving birth, while a white bag indicates ease and ease of birth. A travel bag in a married woman’s dream. If you are married and see in your dream that you are carrying a travel bag. This is a sign of the nearness of pregnancy, but if the bag is heavy, This is a sign of competition with the husband. If the bag contains new clothes, this indicates good news. A travel bag in a man’s dream. A travel bag in a man’s dream indicates a long-term work contract. Abroad, it indicates money if it is white or marriage if it is red. Stealing a suitcase or suitcase in a dream Stealing a suitcase generally indicates wasting time or the end of life on trivial matters, such as this dream. It portends to its owner the loss of a valuable thing or a loved one and the loss of the suitcase. It indicates the disclosure of a secret or the emergence of a painful truth that may not be in the The interest of the dreamer, that is, the dreamer. Did you find a bag in a dream? If you see in your dream that you found a bag or found it, then opened it, then this is a sign of a trip, and if you leave it, this indicates the loss of a valuable opportunity, but if you find a bag full of money, this is a sign that you have lost A large amount of money. But if you find the bag full of new clothes, a positive change will occur in your life. The bag full of food or food. It indicates halal work and living. If you find a bag full of toiletries or makeup, this is a sign of the presence of a lying woman in your life. But if the bag

title: Interpretation of seeing education in a dream

preview.html: I likeFansSubscribedFans Interpretation of the vision of teaching in a dream The presence of teaching in a major’s dream varies according to his social or psychological condition, as well as his work environment and condition, as well as visions, depending on whether he is single, pregnant, male or female. Interpretation of education in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single girl studying in a dream is evidence that she is achieving higher grades in addition to achieving the goals and dreams that she is pursuing. However, if she sees herself carrying a bag and wearing a school uniform, this indicates her bad psychological state, tension and sadness. Where do you see only in a dream, She goes to school, this is a sign that she is entering a new life that satisfies her heart and makes her feel happy and joyful. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream Looking at the profession of a teacher in a dream means that you are thinking about something that worries the dreamer and a person appears in his life who leads him on the path of escaping adversity and difficulties. Seeing a teacher in In a dream, this indicates high status and prestige, as well as the opinion that he teaches, so he will have the reward of scholars, and God knows best. Seeing a teacher in a dream means catching birds or sparrows and perhaps selling them. Seeing a teacher in a dream means that you will obtain a high position in rank, whether that is a lawyer. Or a person with great knowledge. Interpretation of a dream that you hired a teacher. See more. Science in a dream. The highest and highest teacher deserves all the appreciation and respect. Seeing a married woman teaching many students is evidence that she is social and has a lot of charity. Attending teaching, but in a Western school in a dream, is evidence of She went through different stages of her life in addition to her experiences. They saw us teaching children, which is evidence of good nutrition for offspring, and God knows best. But if she sees herself in front of many children, this is evidence that she is shouldering her responsibilities and facing many obstacles in her life. Interpretation of a dream about being a teacher in a dream For a divorced woman, I see a woman who, in addition to being a teacher, is a testament to the status and high grades she will obtain. A divorced woman dreams in her dream that she has become a teacher, and this is evidence of good news for her heart, that she will get a job and have a big business in the very near future. But if she sees her teacher in a dream This is evidence of the loss of sadness and anxiety, as well as sadness and the solution of all problems, praise be to God, and soon you will feel joy and happiness. As visions of success in studying for someone who has separated from the dream are evidence of getting rid of the crises that you are experiencing, overcoming difficulties and entering into a new life. Interpretation of the vision that I am a teacher In a dream for a pregnant woman, I see the job of a teacher, and this is evidence of the blessing of his life and the abundance of his livelihood, and God knows best. If the pregnant woman sees that she has become a teacher, this indicates that the expected date of birth is approaching and that she is in good health. But if she sees the teacher thanking her and glorifying her, then this is evidence of her nourishment and righteousness, and the baby will be among the righteous, by God. I know. When a pregnant woman dreams that she is a teacher, this is a sign of easy childbirth and the birth of a fair, intelligent, and healthy child. But if a pregnant woman sees a teacher, it negates it because it is evidence

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s 10 best interpretations of the appearance of a bed in a dream

preview.html: Important interpretations of seeing a bed and mattress in a dream: Seeing a bed in a dream is a vision that has many meanings and associations that can bring with it - sometimes - good news, and sometimes it shows that the dreamer has bad things in his life, and the bed generally symbolizes the wife and married people. Life, and the interpretation of seeing a bed generally varies from person to person. The interpretation also varies according to the social status of the viewer, as well as the psychological state. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a bed in a dream Seeing a bed in a dream is generally considered a promising vision. If the bed is clean and clean, and vice versa. If a sick person sees a bed in a dream, and its color is white, then the vision is good news that he will recover from his illness, and that he will live his life happily and contentedly. An unmarried man who sees a bed in a dream heralds to the dreamer the date of his soon wedding. If an unmarried girl sees a bed in a dream, and the bed is organized, clean and tidy, she will feel comfortable, and this indicates that someone will propose to her and he is the right person for her. Seeing someone in a dream with an unmade bed is a vision that indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a health problem. The bed in the dream, if it is organized and white in color - according to the interpretation of Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin - the vision indicates that the dreamer will move to a new home or a new job. What is the interpretation of a dream about a hospital bed? Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a person in a dream on a hospital bed is a vision It indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better. If one sees in a dream that he slept in a hospital bed, this means that his relationships at work will improve. If one dreams that he sleeps in a hospital bed and feels uncomfortable and uncomfortable, this means that the dreamer will face some problems and difficulties. In his professional life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sleeping in a hospital bed and the woman feels comfortable during her sleep and it is clean and tidy, this means that her married life is stable and calm. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s bed: A pregnant woman sees in a dream a bed, and the bed is small in size, and this indicates The gender of the fetus is male. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a large bed and sleeps in it and feels comfortable, then this vision is good news that her due date is approaching and that she will have a beautiful female. If a pregnant woman sees a wide bed in a dream, this means that the newborn is female, but if she sees A woman's bed is narrow in a dream, as this is evidence that the baby will be a boy. Interpretation of a dream about a bed cover for a married woman: A bed cover in a dream symbolizes the stability of marital life between spouses. Seeing a beautiful and elegant bed cover in a dream on the bed is a vision that indicates that the couple has a strong relationship full of love. And respect and affection. If a married woman sees a folded sheet in a dream, this is evidence of her husband’s journey. The appearance of a bed in a dream on a shabby and untidy body, a vision that indicates a misfortune.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my daughter being lost at the hands of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my daughter was lostAmong the disturbing dreams in a dream is a man or a woman dreamer but especially it causes mothers great anxiety and stress, so interpreters wanted to interpret this dream from different aspects for all people in detail.I dreamed that my daughter was lostWhen a mother who lives a stable life and has a daughter dreams of her leaving it The vision becomes a sign that her subconscious mind is busy due to the intensity of her constant fear for her daughter. It is an indication of the seriousness of the difficult psychological circumstances that she is going through or that she is exposed to a financial crisis that affects her home, so she always feels inadequate and afraid to think about her home and her children. Losing a young daughter in a dream is pain, and not finding her from an unpredictable dream, as it portends death. A close person in the family or being exposed to major quarrels that are difficult to overcome, while giving birth to a girl. After losing it in a dream, it indicates that conflicts will end after a short period or exposure. One of the family members suffers from serious health problems, but recovery is similar once the child is born, and the search for and acquisition of the child is a factor in interpreting the vision, and in the end both will leave. I dreamed that my daughter was lost by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that losing a girl in a dream is nothing but a severe financial crisis It affects the prisoners and leads them to a state of extreme poverty, because the girl in the dream represents great sustenance and endless kindness, but her loss indicates the loss of all of the above, while the loss of the daughter in the dream is after many efforts of dreams that show that the dreamer is facing many difficulties. In life without getting tired or bored, and despite being exposed to difficulties, she finally arrives. His goal, which is symbolized by taking the girl. Interpretation: I dreamed that my daughter was lost to Ibn Sirin, but I do not care about her and am not looking for her. Dreams warn of selfishness and neglect and indicate the failure of the mother in her role towards her children in general. The vision also indicates domestic violence that threatens the lives of children through bad friends, and the vision is a warning to the mother before it is too late. I dreamed that my daughter was lost to a married woman. Losing a girl in a dream of a married woman and her daughter was about to do something important in life, such as studying or getting married, and she Dreams that express this woman's confusion and inability to make the right decision with her daughter, during the girl's disappearance. A daughter in a dream for a married woman and the inability to see her or know how to search for her is an indication of the beginning of a major crisis that threatens the stability of her family life and she will not be able to escape from it. As for the girl who runs away from her mother in a dream and does not see her or take her again, this is one of the dreams that indicate that the son is doing bad deeds and befriending friends who do not love her well and are following a forbidden path. The mother is helpless in front of her, she could not do anything to her. I dreamed that my daughter lost to the married man in case the daughter was going to marry her. The vision shows the mother’s sadness at her daughter’s distance from her and her anxiety that she cannot see her all the time, while the disappearance of the daughter in a public place among many strangers suggests the existence of a barrier between

When you see the family of your ex-fiancé, you can express your meeting with them, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about hair bracelets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreaming about poetic words in a dream. Interpretation scholars mentioned many different meanings of hair in a dream, and in the following lines we will talk about interpretations of poetic words in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hair in a dream_ Scientists interpreted a dream about a man wrapped in a dream as a sign of the disappearance of his worries and problems._ It also indicates paying debts, settling them, and disposing of them. In some financial crises - a married woman’s dream of hair cuffs indicates the collapse of problems and the resolution of disputes - such as a dream of poetic words for a girl indicates the resolution of some crises and problems with friends - Interpretation of a dream about shaving children’s hair in a dream - Interpretation scholars have gone to say that a dream about shaving a child’s hair indicates some positive things - as it can It can be a sign of obedience, piety, and piety for this child for the future. It can also be a sign of the disappearance of worries and crises that a person faces. It can also be a sign of your desire for a period of goodness, blessing, and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about someone cutting my hair in a dream. In a person’s dream, it indicates that someone Another gets his hair cut. This was a sign of this person’s lack of trust in people. To dream of cutting one’s hair in a dream also indicates a feeling of disappointment, disillusionment, and failure. It could also be a sign of losing money, business, or failure to achieve certain goals. It also indicates the loss or loss of someone one loves. Or he knows it well. Interpretation of my mother’s dream of cutting my hair in a dream_ Scientists interpret seeing a mother cutting her sons’ and daughters’ hair in a dream as evidence of the mother’s status and support._ Where a mother’s dream of cutting her daughter’s hair shows what the mother is doing to help and support the girl_ It also indicates that the mother is trying to provide everything she can. She has it for her son and makes him better. If a boy sees his mother cutting his hair, this is evidence that this boy needs his mother’s help. Interpretation of a dream about someone decorating my hair in a dream. In a dream, decorating hair in a dream indicates that a person offers the best solutions to problems and crises. Dreaming that you decorate your hair in a dream indicates Also to move to better stages - as the bowl in a girl’s dream may indicate her desire to get married or engaged - dreaming of someone decorating my hair in a dream indicates that this person will add some positive touches to what the dreamer is going through. Interpretation of a dream about styling hair with a dry blow in a dream - interpretation scholars said Summer with a hairdryer is a sign of some positive things. To dream of an ordinary girl with bouffant hair means that this girl will enjoy good things and joy. A dream about removing hair with a dryer for a married woman also indicates the calm and stability that this woman experiences. A dream about a pregnant woman also means sustenance, blessings, joy, and enjoyment of order. Interpretation of a dream Hairdressing in a hairdressing salon in a dream - Scientists interpreted a woman’s dream of going to the barber as a sign of fun, joy and happiness - Where a girl dreams of going to a hairdresser in a dream indicates this girl’s desire to marry someone she agrees with - If a married woman sees herself going

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Nuh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see or hear Surat Noah in a dream. She is one of the most prophets sent by God to guide people in guidance. Seeing Surat Nuh as a man in a dream, which indicates his distance from the bad friends who gather around him, so that he can live a decent life without temptation. Whoever reads Surah Nu in a dream will meet a group of those who disobeyed God and then guide them to the straight path. Reading it in a low, audible voice indicates the occurrence of a happy occasion, usually the wedding of a wealthy person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Nuh in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Nuh in a dream, seeing it in a dream is one of the good dreams that indicate happiness, piety, and victory. On the enemies. Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh by Ibn Sirin. Based on what was reported in the world of Ibn Sirin, we explain to you the impact of this vision in the following points: Interpretation of dreams: If you see or hear Surat Nuh in a dream, it means fear and danger to escape from the one who reads it in the dream. It symbolizes To the degree of knowledge and wisdom that the dreamer possesses and that benefits those around him. Whoever reads Surat Nuh in a dream will meet a group of people who disobeyed God and then guide them to the straight path. Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream for a single girl. I saw a single woman reading Nuh or reading it while she was asleep: This dream indicates That his kind and gentle personality has won everyone's respect. It symbolizes that she and her family live in a quiet and stable family without problems or suffering. This shows that he has always longed to get closer to Almighty God in word and deed. Whoever wants to bring evil and evil to her, God will expose her and save her from the conspiracy. Reading it in a low, audible voice indicates the appearance of a happy occasion, usually the wedding of a wealthy man. The fulfillment of the dream that he has been pursuing for years is good news. Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream for a single woman. Through the following paragraphs we present to you signs Different indicates that you see Surat Nuh in a married dream. Her reading shows that her husband’s character has made her live a happy life ever since. It symbolizes recovery from any illness she suffered thanks to God’s grace, health and well-being. If there are disagreements between her and her husband, she warns God that she is ready To end these disputes as quickly as possible. Hearing Surat Nuh in a dream shows the destruction of her evil friends and family and hatred of enemies. This also indicates that transferring the memory of the righteous will soon become very important and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream for a pregnant woman Below we will detail the meaning of a woman’s vision The pregnant woman reads Surah Nuh or listens to it during pregnancy. She pointed out the extent of her concern for the health of the fetus and the pain of pregnancy, but God Almighty will save her from reality and facilitate childbirth. This vision symbolizes for her that she is carrying a male fetus searching for the truth when it grows up and depriving people of falsehood, and God Almighty I know. The interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained the dream of seeing Surat Nuh, and said: Whoever recites it to him or has it read to him like Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him. He said: He raises his hesitation and does justice and supports his enemies.

The interpretation of seeing Surat Nuh in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi explained the dream of seeing Surat Nuh, and said: Whoever recites it to him or has it read to him like Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him. He said: He raises his hesitation and does justice and supports his enemies.
